content.description: Start seated on a triangle-shaped sloper. Make one or two big moves two finish straight above.
content.location: On the small boulder located directly on top of the Jamrock/Bowser Crack boulder (on the backside of the Four Eyes boulder)

content.description: Climb the spire-shaped boulder. Great climb for beginners as it's slightly less than vertical and sports an abundance of hand and footholds right where you want them.
content.location: The freestanding spire-shaped pillar 40 feet uphill and to the left (northwest) of the Metroid Prime boulder.

content.description: Climb the left leaning crack to the left of the spire-shaped boulder and to the right of Appeasing the Gods (the hard looking boulder that starts on two very small crimps in a horizontal seam).
content.location: 40 feet uphill and to the left (northwest) of the Metroid Prime boulder.

content.description: Climb the squeeze chimney created by the large flake, for maximum fun squeeze fully into the chimney before beginning to climb. A great climb if you’re a Trad climber who was roped into a bouldering trip.
content.protection: None, it’s a squeeze chimney, you literally can’t fall
content.location: The Sanctuary Boulders, in between Sanctuary Crack and Slickfoot Sanctuary

content.description:
Begin crouched on the left side of the boulder on positive holds. Traverse right on the sloping ledge under the overhang and top out on the right side of the boulder.

The starting holds are pretty high off the ground so we stepped onto the sloping ledge from the adjacent boulder to start the problem.
content.location: Directly uphill from the Metroid Prime boulder.

content.description: Climb the center of the tall slab using the left-facing, zigzagging vertical rail. Good holds and feet the whole way with a mellow top-out; great climb for those looking to practice their highballing skills.
content.location: 30 feet uphill and to the left (northwest) of the Metroid Prime boulder.

content.description: Climb the hanging face from the painfully small crimps in the horizontal face.
content.location:
The overhanging bulge to the left of

Sanctuary Crack

. 40 feet uphill and to the left (northwest) of the Metroid Prime boulder.
